summary: Nazgul sword...I used the model, its not the best im still learning but im planing on updating this with more content.
descriptionHtml:
I used the shape of the nazguls sword from LOTR and i aded my first ever texture ...yay...
Im still new at this so go easy.
Bout the sword - there is no scabbard yet, the texture needs fixing and the mesh and everything so stay tuned if you like it.
Oh to get the sword type help sword 4 and the name will be \"Test sword\" - player.additem and the id that comes up as \"Test sword\".

To instal: Place the data folder in your Skyrim main directory, enable the Sword.esp from the data files in the launcher.

To uninstal: Remove the sword.esp
The Sword folder in Data\\meshes\\weapons
and in Data\\meshes\\textures
author: Starwatcher
